thread.title: Marie
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Marie

author: Marie
title: Marie
text: I've been using American Frame for years with very happy results. But this past purchase was more difficult because the photo I uploaded of my art piece appeared upside down. I could not flip it, and the help desk could not help. I tried flipping the photo and then uploading it, but nothing worked, so I chose my frame and mat using an upside down photo. Not ideal, to say the least, but fortunately the end result is fine.
